resources: Flip 2 DND Uses device sensors to detect phone orientation and automatically enable Do Not Disturb mode when face down Toggle Flip 2 DND service Home Settings About Behavior Sound Vibration Support Donate" DND is OFF DND is ON Service is running Service is not running Flip Sensitivity Screen Off Only Priority DND Notifications Enabled High Sensitivity Mode Battery Saver Activation Delay Delay before activating DND after flipping the phone %1$d seconds DND On Sound DND Off Sound Use Custom Volume Custom Volume Use Custom Vibration Custom Vibration Strength Sound Enabled Vibration Enabled DND On Vibration Pattern DND Off Vibration Pattern Adjust the sensitivity of flip detection Enable DND only when screen is off Enable Priority mode DND instead of Total Silence Show notifications when flip is detected or DND state changes When enabled, any orientation that\'s not face down will be considered face up Automatically toggles Battery Saver with DND (Requires ADB permission for automatic toggle) ADB Permission Required To enable automatic Battery Saver toggling, please grant the WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS permission using the following ADB command: Copy Command Close adb shell pm grant dev.robin.flip_2_dnd android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS Sound to play when DND is enabled Sound to play when DND is disabled Use custom volume for DND sounds Volume to use for DND sounds Use custom vibration for DND Strength of vibration to use for DND Enable sound for DND Enable vibration for DND Use custom vibration strength Extras Join Telegram Join our Telegram Community (Requires Pro) Support Developer Help keep the app free and improving Your support helps keep this app free and continously improving!
